makkah-event-1.title: The Birth of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH)
makkah-event-1.description: This event marks the birth of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) in Makkah.

makkah-event-2.title: The Construction of Kaaba
makkah-event-2.description: A historical moment when Prophet Ibrahim and his son Ismail rebuilt the Kaaba.

madina-event-1.title: The Treaty of Hudaybiyyah
madina-event-1.description: The Treaty of Hudaybiyyah was a pivotal moment in Islamic history that occurred in Madina.

makkah-event-3.title: The Conquest of Makkah
makkah-event-3.description: The Conquest of Makkah was a significant moment in Islamic history.

madina-event-4.title: The Battle of Badr
madina-event-4.description: The Battle of Badr was a key event in the early days of Islam.
